department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: To provide Janitorial Services, including all labor, material, and equipment for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), located at Connaught Rifle Range.
full_summary:
### Contract Notice for Janitorial Services at Connaught Range
#### Contract Number: WS3989745875
#### Solicitation Number: WS3989745875
#### Amended Number: 4

This contract notice has been amended four times. The notice was originally published on May 13, 2024, and it closes on June 26, 2024, at 14:00:00.

#### Opportunity Details
* **Classification:** 72000000, 76110000
* **Description:** Building and facility construction and maintenance services, and cleaning and janitorial services
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

Please note that this contract is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

#### Procurement Method
* **Method type:** Competitive and open bidding
* **Selection criteria:** Lowest price

####(contract description) 
Bidder(s) must provide janitorial services including all labor, materials, and equipment for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at Connaught Rifle Range, 35 Shirley blvd., Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. The bidder must arrange a site visit on Wednesday, June 5, 2024 at 10:30 a.m. EDT.  Must send confirmation of attendance by May 27, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Failure to visit the site will result in the exclusion of the bidder from the proposal.

####Contact Details 
Contact:
Richard, Caroline
Address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, 
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Telephone: None
Fax: None
Email Address: caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
